name: Golden Best
description: A mod that changes the percentage to gold when you are achieving a new best!

practice-mode.name: Show in Practice Mode
practice-mode.description: Whether or not to change the percentage while in practice mode

platformer-mode.name: Show in Platformer Mode
platformer-mode.description: Whether or not to change the time to be gold while playing a platformer level.

test-mode.name: Show in Startpos Mode
test-mode.description: Whether or not to change the percentage / time to be gold while playing the level with Startpos or in Test Mode.

enable-colors.name: Enable Custom Colors
enable-colors.description: Instead of changing to the gold font, the color of the label will change instead! (Requires restarting level upon setting change)

custom-color.name: New Best Color
custom-color.description: What color to change the percentage / time when achieving a new best.
